description:
goprotobuf: Fix Size for groups.

The previous code did not account for groups at all;
the test data was getting lucky.

Fixes issue 38.

messages.text:

goprotobuf: Fix Size for groups.

The previous code did not account for groups at all;
the test data was getting lucky.

Fixes issue 38.
